comment: * Internal class to wrap a SAX2 Attributes object for SAX1.

methods.name: void setAttributes(Attributes attributes)
methods.comment:
* Set the embedded Attributes object.
     *
     * @param The embedded SAX2 Attributes.

methods.name: public int getLength()
methods.comment:
* Return the number of attributes.
     *
     * @return The length of the attribute list.
     * @see org.xml.sax.AttributeList#getLength

methods.name: public String getName(int i)
methods.comment:
* Return the qualified (prefixed) name of an attribute by position.
     *
     * @return The qualified name.
     * @see org.xml.sax.AttributeList#getName

methods.name: public String getType(int i)
methods.comment:
* Return the type of an attribute by position.
     *
     * @return The type.
     * @see org.xml.sax.AttributeList#getType(int)

methods.name: public String getValue(int i)
methods.comment:
* Return the value of an attribute by position.
     *
     * @return The value.
     * @see org.xml.sax.AttributeList#getValue(int)

methods.name: public String getType(String qName)
methods.comment:
* Return the type of an attribute by qualified (prefixed) name.
     *
     * @return The type.
     * @see org.xml.sax.AttributeList#getType(java.lang.String)

methods.name: public String getValue(String qName)
methods.comment:
* Return the value of an attribute by qualified (prefixed) name.
     *
     * @return The value.
     * @see org.xml.sax.AttributeList#getValue(java.lang.String)
